level.heading: Mandatory stop work orders.
level.text: ยง28-207.2.4 Mandatory stop work orders. The commissioner shall issue stop work orders in the circumstances set forth below. Upon issuance of such stop work order, the work shall immediately stop and shall not resume until the stop work order is rescinded by the department. The stop work order shall not be rescinded less than two business days after the date of issuance of such order. Nothing in the following section shall be construed to limit the commissioner's power to issue stop work orders in other circumstances.
